body.p: Each connected Color Monitor must have a unique Modbus address between 1 and 247. You specify the Modbus address of the Color Monitor and the number of devices in its device chain on the Color Monitor setup screen. (See WaveStar Color Monitor, Setup and Operation P-164001109) The Color Monitor assigns sequential addresses for each device in its device chain based on the device count.Improper configuration of a WaveStar Color Monitor may block other monitors or devices on the chain.
